cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T.6629
REPORT OF THE DEPARTMENTAL COMMITTEE ON AWARDS TO INVENTORS.
MEMORANDUM BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF TRADE.
With reference to the report of the Departmental Committee on Awards to Inventors (G.T. 6500) I desire to say that the Board of Trade agree with the recommendations of the Committee.
A.H.STANLEY.
Board of Trade,
January 9th, 1919.
